16 // Names to read values from the parameter server
17 const std::string GROUP_PARAM = "group";
18 const std::string BASE_LINK = "base_link";
19 const std::string EE_LINK = "ee_link";
20 
21 // How many times do we repeat tests based on random joint values?
22 const int NUM_RANDOM_TESTS{ 50 };
23 
24 // Robot description almost always called "robot_description" and therefore hardcoded below
25 const std::string ROBOT_DESCRIPTION = "robot_description";
26 
27 moveit_msgs::PositionConstraint createPositionConstraint(std::string& base_link, std::string& ee_link_name)
28 {
29  shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive box_constraint;
30  box_constraint.type = shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive::BOX;
31  box_constraint.dimensions = { 0.05, 0.4, 0.05 }; /* use -1 to indicate no constraints. */
32 
33  geometry_msgs::Pose box_pose;
34  box_pose.position.x = 0.9;
35  box_pose.position.y = 0.0;
36  box_pose.position.z = 0.2;
37  box_pose.orientation.w = 1.0;
38 
39  moveit_msgs::PositionConstraint position_constraint;
40  position_constraint.header.frame_id = base_link;
41  position_constraint.link_name = ee_link_name;
42  position_constraint.constraint_region.primitives.push_back(box_constraint);
43  position_constraint.constraint_region.primitive_poses.push_back(box_pose);
44 
45  return position_constraint;
46 }
47 
48 moveit_msgs::OrientationConstraint createOrientationConstraint(std::string& base_link, std::string& ee_link_name)
49 {
50  moveit_msgs::OrientationConstraint orientation_constraint;
51  orientation_constraint.header.frame_id = base_link;
52  orientation_constraint.link_name = ee_link_name;
53  orientation_constraint.orientation.w = 1.0;
54  orientation_constraint.absolute_x_axis_tolerance = 0.1;
55  orientation_constraint.absolute_y_axis_tolerance = 0.1;
56  orientation_constraint.absolute_z_axis_tolerance = -1.0;
57  return orientation_constraint;
58 }
59 
60 Eigen::Vector3d rotationToRPY(const Eigen::Matrix3d& r)
61 {
62  Eigen::Vector3d xyz = r.eulerAngles(0, 1, 2);
63  // in MoveIt some wrapping is done sometimes, but I'm not sure why or when to apply it yet
64  // probably to convert the eigen convention: [0:pi]x[-pi:pi]x[-pi:pi] to a MoveIt convention?
65  // but it looks the same to me
66  // it does not seem to work in some cases.
67  // xyz(0) = std::min(fabs(xyz(0)), M_PI - fabs(xyz(0)));
68  // xyz(1) = std::min(fabs(xyz(1)), M_PI - fabs(xyz(1)));
69  // xyz(2) = std::min(fabs(xyz(2)), M_PI - fabs(xyz(2)));
70  return xyz;
71 }
72 
73 Eigen::Vector3d poseToRPY(const Eigen::Isometry3d& p)
74 {
75  return rotationToRPY(p.rotation());
76 }
77 
78 class TestConstraints : public ::testing::Test
79 {
80 protected:
81  void SetUp() override
82  {
83  ros::NodeHandle nh;
84  if (nh.getParam(GROUP_PARAM, group_name_) && nh.getParam(BASE_LINK, base_link_name_) &&
85  nh.getParam(EE_LINK, ee_link_name_))
86  {
87  robot_model_loader_ = std::make_shared<robot_model_loader::RobotModelLoader>(ROBOT_DESCRIPTION);
88  robot_model_ = robot_model_loader_->getModel();
89  robot_state_ = std::make_shared<robot_state::RobotState>(robot_model_);
90  joint_model_group_ = robot_state_->getJointModelGroup(group_name_);
91  num_dofs_ = joint_model_group_->getVariableCount();
92  }
93  else
94  {
95  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Failed to read " << GROUP_PARAM << " from parameter server.");
96  }
97  }
98  void TearDown() override
99  {
100  }
101 
102  const Eigen::Isometry3d fk(const Eigen::VectorXd q) const
103  {
104  robot_state_->setJointGroupPositions(joint_model_group_, q);
105  return robot_state_->getGlobalLinkTransform(ee_link_name_);
106  }
107 
108  Eigen::VectorXd getRandomState()
109  {
110  robot_state_->setToRandomPositions(joint_model_group_);
111  Eigen::VectorXd q;
112  robot_state_->copyJointGroupPositions(joint_model_group_, q);
113  return q;
114  }
115 
116  Eigen::MatrixXd numericalJacobianPosition(const Eigen::VectorXd q)
117  {
118  const double h{ 1e-6 }; /* step size for numerical derivation */
119 
120  Eigen::MatrixXd J = Eigen::MatrixXd::Zero(3, num_dofs_);
121 
122  // helper matrix for differentiation.
123  Eigen::MatrixXd Ih = h * Eigen::MatrixXd::Identity(num_dofs_, num_dofs_);
124 
125  for (std::size_t dim{ 0 }; dim < num_dofs_; ++dim)
126  {
127  Eigen::Vector3d pos = fk(q).translation();
128  Eigen::Vector3d pos_plus_h = fk(q + Ih.col(dim)).translation();
129  Eigen::Vector3d col = (pos_plus_h - pos) / h;
130  J.col(dim) = col;
131  }
132  return J;
133  }
134 
135  Eigen::MatrixXd numericalJacobianRPY(const Eigen::VectorXd q)
136  {
137  const double h{ 1e-8 }; /* step size for numerical derivation */
138 
139  Eigen::MatrixXd J = Eigen::MatrixXd::Zero(3, num_dofs_);
140 
141  // helper matrix for differentiation.
142  Eigen::MatrixXd Ih = h * Eigen::MatrixXd::Identity(num_dofs_, num_dofs_);
143 
144  for (std::size_t dim{ 0 }; dim < num_dofs_; ++dim)
145  {
146  auto rpy = poseToRPY(fk(q));
147  auto rpy_plus_h = poseToRPY(fk(q + Ih.col(dim)));
148  Eigen::Vector3d col = (rpy_plus_h - rpy) / h;
149  J.col(dim) = col;
150  }
151  return J;
152  }
153 
154  robot_model_loader::RobotModelLoaderPtr robot_model_loader_;
155  robot_model::RobotModelPtr robot_model_;
156  robot_state::RobotStatePtr robot_state_;
157  const robot_state::JointModelGroup* joint_model_group_;
158  std::string group_name_;
159  std::string base_link_name_;
160  std::string ee_link_name_;
161  std::string robot_description_name_;
162  std::size_t num_dofs_;
163  std::shared_ptr<elion::BaseConstraint> constraint_;
164 };
165 
166 TEST_F(TestConstraints, InitPositionConstraint)
167 {
168  moveit_msgs::Constraints constraint_msgs;
169  constraint_msgs.position_constraints.push_back(createPositionConstraint(base_link_name_, ee_link_name_));
170 
171  constraint_ = std::make_shared<elion::PositionConstraint>(robot_model_, group_name_, num_dofs_);
172  constraint_->init(constraint_msgs);
173 }
174 
175 TEST_F(TestConstraints, PositionConstraintJacobian)
176 {
177  moveit_msgs::Constraints constraint_msgs;
178  constraint_msgs.position_constraints.push_back(createPositionConstraint(base_link_name_, ee_link_name_));
179 
180  constraint_ = std::make_shared<elion::PositionConstraint>(robot_model_, group_name_, num_dofs_);
181  constraint_->init(constraint_msgs);
182 
183  double total_error{ 999.9 };
184  const double ERROR_TOLERANCE{ 1e-4 };
186  for (int i{ 0 }; i < NUM_RANDOM_TESTS; ++i)
187  {
188  auto q = getRandomState();
189  auto J_exact = constraint_->calcErrorJacobian(q);
190  auto J_finite_diff = numericalJacobianPosition(q);
191 
192  // std::cout << "Analytical jacobian: \n";
193  // std::cout << J_exact << std::endl;
194  // std::cout << "Finite difference jacobian: \n";
195  // std::cout << J_finite_diff << std::endl;
196 
197  total_error = (J_exact - J_finite_diff).lpNorm<1>();
198  EXPECT_LT(total_error, ERROR_TOLERANCE);
199  }
200 }
201 
202 TEST_F(TestConstraints, PositionConstraintOMPLCheck)
203 {
204  auto state_space = std::make_shared<ompl::base::RealVectorStateSpace>(num_dofs_);
205  ompl::base::RealVectorBounds bounds(num_dofs_);
206 
207  // get joint limits from the joint model group
208  auto joint_limits = joint_model_group_->getActiveJointModelsBounds();
209  EXPECT_EQ(joint_limits.size(), num_dofs_);
210  for (std::size_t i{ 0 }; i < num_dofs_; ++i)
211  {
212  EXPECT_EQ(joint_limits[i]->size(), 1);
213  bounds.setLow(i, joint_limits[i]->at(0).min_position_);
214  bounds.setHigh(i, joint_limits[i]->at(0).max_position_);
215  }
216 
217  state_space->setBounds(bounds);
218 
219  moveit_msgs::Constraints constraint_msgs;
220  constraint_msgs.position_constraints.push_back(createPositionConstraint(base_link_name_, ee_link_name_));
221 
222  constraint_ = std::make_shared<elion::PositionConstraint>(robot_model_, group_name_, num_dofs_);
223  constraint_->init(constraint_msgs);
224 
225  auto constrained_state_space = std::make_shared<ompl::base::ProjectedStateSpace>(state_space, constraint_);
226 
227  // constrained_state_space->constrainedSanityChecks(ompl::base::ConstrainedStateSpace::SanityChecks::CONSTRAINED_STATESPACE_JACOBIAN);
228  // I copied the Jacobian testing code from the sanityCheck below to investigate the problem
229 
230  for (int i{ 0 }; i < NUM_RANDOM_TESTS; ++i)
231  {
232  auto* s1 = constrained_state_space->allocState()->as<ompl::base::ProjectedStateSpace::StateType>();
233  ompl::base::StateSamplerPtr ss = constrained_state_space->allocStateSampler();
234 
235  ss->sampleUniform(s1);
236 
237  Eigen::MatrixXd j_a(3, num_dofs_), j_n(3, num_dofs_);
238  constraint_->jacobian(*s1, j_a); // Implemented in elion approximation
239  constraint_->Constraint::jacobian(*s1, j_n); // Numerical approximation
240 
241  // eliminate issues with the numerical jacobian at the bounds of the constraints
242  // because of the finite interval used for numerical differentiation,
243  // some function evaluation could be outside of the bounds and result in
244  // a non-zero constraint function
245  // I suspect this is what causes (rare) failures of the test without this fix
246  Eigen::Vector3d fun;
247  constraint_->function(*s1, fun);
248  for (std::size_t i{ 0 }; i < constraint_->getCoDimension(); ++i)
249  {
250  if (std::abs(fun[i]) < constraint_->getTolerance())
251  {
252  j_n.row(i) = Eigen::VectorXd::Zero(num_dofs_);
253  }
254  }
255 
256  // std::cout << "Test for joint values: \n";
257  // std::cout << s1->transpose() << std::endl;
258  // std::cout << "End-effector position: \n";
259  // std::cout << fk(*s1).translation().transpose() << std::endl;
260  // std::cout << "Analytical jacobian: \n";
261  // std::cout << j_a << std::endl;
262  // std::cout << "Finite difference jacobian: \n";
263  // std::cout << j_n << std::endl;
264 
265  EXPECT_LT((j_a - j_n).norm(), constraint_->getTolerance());
266  }
267 }
268 
269 TEST_F(TestConstraints, InitAngleAxisConstraint)
270 {
271  moveit_msgs::Constraints constraint_msgs;
272  constraint_msgs.orientation_constraints.push_back(createOrientationConstraint(base_link_name_, ee_link_name_));
273 
274  constraint_ = std::make_shared<elion::AngleAxisConstraint>(robot_model_, group_name_, num_dofs_);
275  constraint_->init(constraint_msgs);
276 }
277 
278 TEST_F(TestConstraints, AngleAxisConstraintOMPLCheck)
279 {
280  auto state_space = std::make_shared<ompl::base::RealVectorStateSpace>(num_dofs_);
281  ompl::base::RealVectorBounds bounds(num_dofs_);
282 
283  // get joint limits from the joint model group
284  auto joint_limits = joint_model_group_->getActiveJointModelsBounds();
285  EXPECT_EQ(joint_limits.size(), num_dofs_);
286  for (std::size_t i{ 0 }; i < num_dofs_; ++i)
287  {
288  EXPECT_EQ(joint_limits[i]->size(), 1);
289  bounds.setLow(i, joint_limits[i]->at(0).min_position_);
290  bounds.setHigh(i, joint_limits[i]->at(0).max_position_);
291  }
292 
293  state_space->setBounds(bounds);
294 
295  moveit_msgs::Constraints constraint_msgs;
296  constraint_msgs.orientation_constraints.push_back(createOrientationConstraint(base_link_name_, ee_link_name_));
297 
298  constraint_ = std::make_shared<elion::AngleAxisConstraint>(robot_model_, group_name_, num_dofs_);
299  constraint_->init(constraint_msgs);
300 
301  auto constrained_state_space = std::make_shared<ompl::base::ProjectedStateSpace>(state_space, constraint_);
302 
303  // constrained_state_space->constrainedSanityChecks(ompl::base::ConstrainedStateSpace::SanityChecks::CONSTRAINED_STATESPACE_JACOBIAN);
304  // I copied the Jacobian testing code from the sanityCheck below to investigate the problem
305 
306  for (int i{ 0 }; i < NUM_RANDOM_TESTS; ++i)
307  {
308  auto* s1 = constrained_state_space->allocState()->as<ompl::base::ProjectedStateSpace::StateType>();
309  ompl::base::StateSamplerPtr ss = constrained_state_space->allocStateSampler();
310 
311  ss->sampleUniform(s1);
312 
313  Eigen::MatrixXd j_a(3, num_dofs_), j_n(3, num_dofs_);
314  constraint_->jacobian(*s1, j_a); // Implemented in elion approximation
315  constraint_->Constraint::jacobian(*s1, j_n); // Numerical approximation
316 
317  // eliminate issues with the numerical jacobian at the bounds of the constraints
318  // because of the finite interval used for numerical differentiation,
319  // some function evaluation could be outside of the bounds and result in
320  // a non-zero constraint function
321  // I suspect this is what causes (rare) failures of the test without this fix
322  Eigen::Vector3d fun;
323  constraint_->function(*s1, fun);
324  for (std::size_t i{ 0 }; i < constraint_->getCoDimension(); ++i)
325  {
326  if (std::abs(fun[i]) < constraint_->getTolerance())
327  {
328  j_n.row(i) = Eigen::VectorXd::Zero(num_dofs_);
329  }
330  }
331 
332  // std::cout << "Test for joint values: \n";
333  // std::cout << s1->transpose() << std::endl;
334  // std::cout << "End-effector position: \n";
335  // std::cout << fk(*s1).translation().transpose() << std::endl;
336  // std::cout << "Analytical jacobian: \n";
337  // std::cout << j_a << std::endl;
338  // std::cout << "Finite difference jacobian: \n";
339  // std::cout << j_n << std::endl;
340 
341  EXPECT_LT((j_a - j_n).norm(), constraint_->getTolerance());
342  }
343 }

357 TEST_F(TestConstraints, RPYConstraintJacobian)
358 {
359  moveit_msgs::Constraints constraint_msgs;
360  constraint_msgs.orientation_constraints.push_back(createOrientationConstraint(base_link_name_, ee_link_name_));
361 
362  constraint_ = std::make_shared<elion::RPYConstraints>(robot_model_, group_name_, num_dofs_);
363  constraint_->init(constraint_msgs);
364 
365  double total_error{ 999.9 };
366  const double ERROR_TOLERANCE{ 1e-4 };
367  // 1e-5 also works most of the time, but not always...
368 
369  for (int i{ 0 }; i < NUM_RANDOM_TESTS; ++i)
370  {
371  auto q = getRandomState();
372  auto J_exact = constraint_->calcErrorJacobian(q);
373  auto J_finite_diff = numericalJacobianRPY(q);
374 
375  // std::cout << "Analytical jacobian: \n";
376  // std::cout << J_exact << std::endl;
377  // std::cout << "Finite difference jacobian: \n";
378  // std::cout << J_finite_diff << std::endl;
379 
380  total_error = (J_exact - J_finite_diff).lpNorm<1>();
381  EXPECT_LT(total_error, ERROR_TOLERANCE);
382  }
383 }

389  return RUN_ALL_TESTS();
